General.Name: Keramika Indonesia Assosiasi
General.Description: PT Keramika Indonesia Assosiasi Tbk engages in production and sale of various ceramic products in Indonesia, Asia, Europe, and the United States. It operates in two segments, Ceramic and Roof Tiles. The company offers floor, wall, granite, roof, and vinyl tiles; sanitary ware products, such as toilet products and wash bowls; and sanitary fittings, including showers, faucets, mixer stop valves, bath mixers, floor drain squares, and kitchen faucets. It provides its products under the KIA, IMPRESSO, CAMPANA, SOSUCO, SGI, COTTO, and PRIME brands. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Keramika Indonesia Assosiasi Tbk is a subsidiary of SCG Building Materials Co., Ltd.
